value.title: Draw X-Axis Constant Line for Power BI Line Charts
value.excerpt: Welcome to new Power BI Desktop Updates for March 2021. During this session, we will learn how we can draw Constant Line for X- Axis for Line Chart in Power BI. Microsoft recently introduce this new feature during March 2021 of Power BI Desktop update!   When we have date or number data type as columns,

value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I‚Äôm going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is ‚Äì DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column. This will also include Blank as a distinct record. As a result due to

value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI. We can perform forecasting with a Line chart in Power BI.  In this video, we have taken an example of a real-life scenario to forecast our data.  Stay Connected
